Method Detail

getFilm

public static List<Trailer> getFilm(String filmId,
                                    int count,
                                    int width)
                             throws TrailerAddictException
List trailers by a particular film. This method uses the string representation of the film name from the TrailerAddict website. E.G. "Max Payne" is max-payne

Parameters:
filmId -
count - The number of trailers to return
width - The width to be used in the embedded URL
Throws:
TrailerAddictException

getFeatured

public static List<Trailer> getFeatured(String featured,
                                        int count,
                                        int width)
                                 throws TrailerAddictException
Get a list of the featured trailers or just the newest trailers. Setting featured="yes" will list all trailers TrailerAddict deems popular or important. Setting featured="no" then the most recent trailer additions will be listed

Parameters:
featured - Either 'yes' or 'no'
count - The number of trailers to return
width - The width to be used in the embedded URL
Throws:
TrailerAddictException

getFeatured

                                        int count)
                                 throws TrailerAddictException

Parameters:
featured - Either 'yes' or 'no'
count - The number of trailers to return
Throws:
TrailerAddictException
